rule: Implement strong access control measures to restrict access to sensitive data and resources.
Implement robust security measures to protect account data at rest and in transit.
Enable comprehensive logging and monitoring capabilities to track and detect suspicious activities.
Implement strong perimeter security measures, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and vulnerability scanning tools.
Develop and implement a comprehensive incident response plan to promptly identify and mitigate security incidents.
Ensure compliance with relevant industry regulations and best practices, such as PCI DSS, HIPAA, and ISO 27001.
